original_text: Take double the amount of silver with you, for you must return the silver that was put back into the mouths of your sacks. Perhaps it was a mistake.
korean_text: 너희 손에 갑절의 돈을 가지고 너희 자루 아귀에 도로 넣어져 있던 그 돈을 다시 가지고 가라 혹 잘못이 있었을까 두렵도다

sentences.original_text: Take double the amount of silver with you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 은 두 배를 가지고 가라

sentences.original_text: for you must return the silver
that was put back into the mouths of your sacks
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 자루의 입구에 넣어 두었던 은을
